location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Arthur Naylor Wollaston, India Office, to Sir Rutherford Alcock

mods.abstract: Letter regarding an enclosed letter from William H Allen & Co regarding the cost of printing plates and suggesting solutions for him and Sir Lewis to consider.Enclosed letter from William H Allen & Co to Arthur Naylor Wollaston, dated 12 March 1879 regarding the cost of producing the plates for Pelly's book in comparison to the volume of books to be published.
